main_definition: The earliest possible time or the shortest duration before an event occurs.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Most immediate in arrival or occurrence, indicating little to no delay.
meanings_and_examples.example: The repair team will arrive soonest by tomorrow morning.

meanings_and_examples.definition: With the shortest possible time interval between two points.
meanings_and_examples.example: To minimize travel time, she took the flight that landed soonest at her destination.

meanings_and_examples.definition: The earliest among others in terms of expected or desired timing.
meanings_and_examples.example: Among all his friends' birthdays this month, his will come sooner than the rest.
